Name: pilot_ursus
Description: Ursus, formally known as Empire of Ursus or Ursus Empire, is the largest country in Terra which borders Kazimierz, Leithania, Sami, and Yen. Ursus is famed for its military might and the physical prowess of its mostly Ursin inhabitants. It is a monarchy with the Emperor as the head of state, although a power struggle between the aristocracy and the military leaders trying to gain the Emperor's favor is happening behind the scenes.
